I must say, I'm not a fan of games that come in 'chapters'. I realise there's an eagerness for authors to get their work out there as soon as possible but it just seems a bit of a cop out from making a finished game and then what inevitably happens is the author doesn't get the praise they feel they're due and so eventually give up making them mid story anyway (which suspiciously looks like what's happened here).

Also with how the moderation works with submitted games at the moment, unless it's obviously had a great deal of effort put into making it stand out from the rest of the pack, it'll likely end up in the sandpit as 'too short' or 'incomplete'.
